Dear {!Contact.FirstName} ,
Welcome to Ipreo's BD Corporate platform. BD Corporate is the leading source of comprehensive profiles of institutional money managers and their cross-asset class holdings information, including equity and fixed income. BD Corporate caters specifically to the IR workflow and acts as an integral resource for investor relations professionals to search, target, and manage all investor interactions. Key areas of differentiation for BD Corporate are:
- Highly flexible targeting functionality and reporting
- Clean and intuitive search functionality
- Global, multi-asset class institutional contacts, profiles and holdings data
- Over 146,000 equity and fixed income contacts at more than 57,900 buy-side and sell-side financial institutions globally
- The hedge fund database alone provides nearly 25,000 investment professionals at over 6,400 hedge fund institutions managing over 26,000 funds
- Advanced analytical and investor screening tools
- Complete contact management capabilities including activity reporting and performance benchmarking
- Full integration with Ipreoâ€™s Global Market Intelligence and Analytics offerings
- Access to Research & Estimates information directly through BD Corporate
- Tagged Qualified Domestic Institutional Investor (QDII) firm profiles and contact information
- Award winning 24 hour follow the sun customer service

Callmenow will respond to your query within 10 minutes at any time of the day or night regardless of your global location.
